topics.body:
"@hype":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/559dc34a63687232e10003fe#post_559dc34a63687232e10003fe
It's not just about pretty pictures mind you. (But yes, the pictures will make for good publicity).

*IT'S ABOUT SCIENCE.
MOTHER F***CKING SCIENCE*
!http://i270.photobucket.com/albums/jj100/Kuchinawa212/Science.jpg!

_You just don't simply fling a *multi-million, piano-sized space probe* into the darkest and further place of the universe, just to take pretty pictures of floating space rocks._

YOU WANNA DO SOME FREAKING SCIENCE OUT THERE.
